name: Tower Fall
description:
Tower Fall is a fun PC alternative to the board game known as "falling tower". The principle is quite simple: a tower is built from even bars (each new “floor” is made with alternating laying direction and consists of 3 bars), and then the players begin to carefully pull out one bar at a time and put it on top of the tower. The one who loses in the game, after the course of which, the tower fell.

Game features:

- 3 types of game:
* game against artificial intelligence
* game between two people
* scoring game
- different types of locations
- several types of bars
